 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּרַט‎</span>] **verb** very dubious, **Qal** ***Participle*** plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַפֹּרְטִים עַלפִּֿי הַנָּ֑בֶל‎</span> [[Amos.6.5|Amos 6:5]] (Late Hebrew ***break off, divide***, so Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּרוּטָה‎</span>, Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎פְּרִיטָא‎</span>, ***small coin, change***, hence) [[BDB#AW|AW]] [[BDB#Ra|Ra]] [[BDB#AE|AE]] [[BDB#Ki|Ki]] ***divide*** words into parts (in singing), [[BDB#AV|AV]] ***chant***; and [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] ***scatter*** (compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֶּרֶט‎</span>) empty words; possibly also would be ***stammer*** (of broken speech; said contemptuously): — (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> is ***precede, act hastily***, IV. ***act extravagantly, talk immoderately*** (see further [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]<sup>Am. 236</sup>), hence) [[BDB#AW|AW]] (as alternative) ***improvise carelessly, idly***.
